word: Nehemiah humbled himself before God, giving Him the glory due unto His name. Thus also did Daniel in Babylon. Let us study the prayers of these men. They teach us that we are to humble ourselves, but that we are never to obliterate the line of demarcation between God\92s commandment-keeping people and those who have no respect for His law.\97(SDA Bible Commentary, vol. 3, 1136.)
